creditline: Gift of Shelly Errington from the collection of her brother, Trois E. Johnson, M.D., and given in his memory
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: standing Madonna in a controposto pose with head tilted to PR slightly, holding Christ child who is seated in the crook of her PL arm; three putti heads with wings at bottom center beneath Madonna's feet; light brown patina; attached to dark wood base with applied floral medallions
title: Madonna and Child on crescent moon
